unittitle_ssm: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America Local Union 787 ledgers and membership indexes
abstract_ssm: This collection contains 15 bound ledgers and three membership indexes of the United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America Local Union 787, based in the Brooklyn neighborhood of Bay Ridge.  The indexes detail information on the Local Union 787's membership and dues, and many entries include members' addresses.
